name: Kukui
description: Kukui is a first person horror game. You play as a 10-year-old named Kyle that is in a coma due to a severe injury, however, you play in his subconscious, accessing all his memories and events that happened before the accident. As the story unfolds you will find out what happened and how you ended up in this situation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 + Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 740 or Better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: The game has options to lower graphic settings.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: The game has options to lower graphic settings.
